alert.note: Alert for Morehouse (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 1:13PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas and northwestern Morehouse Parishes through 215 PM CDT... At 112 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sterlington, or 9 miles north of Claiborne, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Beekman around 150 PM CDT. Crossett around 200 PM CDT. Berlin around 210 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mer Rouge and Bonita. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
